intro: Dracula sergioi, commonly known as the Dragon's Blood Orchid, is a rare and striking orchid native to the cloud forests of Ecuador. It is characterized by its vibrant red flowers, which resemble blood droplets, giving it its common name. The plant has a unique growth habit, with a short, stocky stem and long, fleshy leaves that help it survive in its humid, shaded environment. Dracula sergioi is a member of the Orchidaceae family and is closely related to other epiphytic orchids. Due to its rarity and aesthetic appeal, it is highly sought after by orchid enthusiasts and conservationists alike.
